snippet.title: Jupiter Hell Classic - Teaser
snippet.description:
Wishlist Jupiter Hell Classic on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3126530/

Jupiter Hell Classic is the demake of a remake of a roguelike unmake of a famous 1995 FPS shooter. Rip and Tear! The classic DRL is getting its commercial Steam release with updated gameplay and Jupiter Hell-based tileset!

Join our Discord:  https://discord.gg/ry6V4rQz 
Jupiter Hell Classic website: http://jupiterhellclassic.com/

DRL website: https://drl.chaosforge.org/

Classic DRL remains free on the ChaosForge website and will continue to receive updates alongside the new Jupiter Hell Classic version. Jupiter Hell Classic will be your official way to own and play DRL on Steam, and support ChaosForge in continuing development of the entire series, now spanning over 20 years.
